question: Operation ‘Calypso’, which was seen in news recently, is associated with which field?
explanation:
The Directorate of Revenue Intelligence (DRI) has recently cracked an international drug smuggling racket under the operation codenamed as ‘Calypso’.
It was carried out in Mumbai and Udaipur, Rajasthan for three days. More than half a kg of cocaine couriered from Trinidad & Tobago to Mumbai was seized by DRI. Four persons involved in the drug smuggling were also arrested.
